name: Exo-Phage
description:
Is a fast-paced bullet hell where you play as a virus corrupting the anti-virus so it fights for you.

-----CONTROLS-----

Movement: WASD

Bomb: Space

Mouse: Aim

Mouse button HOLD left: Shoot

Mouse button CLICK left: Burst Shot

R: Reset

-------------------------

Game is made by Me and the music is by Trix
